text: The Japanese phrase may refer to: *"Mamotte Agetai" (Yuna Ito song), a 2010 song by Yuna Ito *"Mamotte Agetai" (Yumi Matsutoya song), a 1981 song by Yumi Matsutoya *Mamotte Agetai, a 1998 manga by Naoki Yamamoto *Mamotte Agetai!, a manga and 2000 film by Ikuko Kujirai *"Mamotte Agetai", a 2013 song by Juju *"Mamotte Agetai", a 2013 song by Yuzu
title: Mamotte Agetai
